title: Morning Joe 4/6/21
description: In a new letter to Major League Baseball commissioner Rob Manfred, Sen. Marco Rubio, R-Fla., asks if Manfred would give up his Augusta National Golf Club membership given the club is in Georgia. MLB moved the All-Star game from Atlanta in response to new voting laws. The Morning Joe panel discusses.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
